summary:
Interim Finance Director/Manager or Change Manager who can help you with:

Restructuring the Finance department, making it cost effective and more pro-active in approach rather than re-active. 
- Shared Service Centers (SSC's): Established or improved with Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) eg: India. 
- Automation within the areas of PTP (AP), OTC (AR) or RTR (GL)
- Introducing Blackline, Certification, Basware workflow (Alusta), Whitevision, Readsoft
- Working more effectively with SAP ECC, Microsoft Dynamics and using Robotics
- Not only for SSC but also for local smaller finance departments

I have set up new SSC for Sanoma Finland, The Netherlands and Belgium.

In depth Financial Control to improve processes from beginning to end 
 - Evaluating the entire process from initial sales order to reporting and consolidation, essential to ensuring clear & efficient processes (Hyperion/HFM/OneStream)
- The result is a smoother process, resulting in a faster close and a more reliable financial outcome
- Also implementing a control framework (Bwise)

As a people manager I am an intermediary between the process and the people, an effective way of getting changes done. I have found that people appreciate getting involved and moving out of their own comfort zone.

I am a team player, reliable, target oriented & focused on getting results for management within the agreed timeline

I am proficient in Dutch, English and French, as I have worked in France, Belgium, The Netherlands and Finland. 


Other Keywords:  Basware IP/Basware PM /Alusta/Certification/AssureNet/BW/Trust-IT/Intercompany/Royalty/Balance reconciliation/Barters/IFRS/VAT/OneStream/Marathon/SOX/ Whitevision/Microsoft Dynamics

Experience in the following markets: Oil/manufacturing/media/retail/food&beverage/Advertising/Energy /Contracting/Catering

projects.title: Balance sheet clean up
projects.description: Balance sheet clean up by introducing automation and harmonization of the processes.

projects.title: Integration or carve out companies within a Financial Shared Services
projects.description: Several companies that we sold or bought need to be integrated in the existing financial processes within Sanoma. This concerns RTR, OTC and PTP processes.

projects.title: Intercompany differences
projects.description: Restructuring Intercompany bookings so the differences are explanatory.

projects.title: One chart of Account
projects.description: Introducing one chart of account accross countries and making an accounting manual where all the accounts are described.

projects.title: Outsourcing FSS to BPO'er in India
projects.description: Setting up a Financial Shared Services including outsouurcing it to a BPO’er in India. Process was from initial cost saving idea towards full outsourcing of the transactional processes, PTP, OTC and RTR of the departments in Finland, Belgium and The Netherlands. Also selecting the right partner, being a transition manager and drawing the new organisation. Change management was an important factor. Result was a saving of a couple of millions a year on finance costs and more flexibility in down- or upgrading.

profile_positions.description:
Are you looking for someone who can help you out in change management projects related to financial processes or do you want to start a Financial Shared Service center, I can help you out. The experience I have in RTR, OTC and AP processes and setting up a FSS with a BPO'er in India can help you further.

I'm known as someone who wants to connect the people with the  processes, get them out of their comfort zone  by giving them a save environment to work in and where feedback is always welcome.

The projects I was involved/responsible for  are:
etting up a Financial Shared Services including outsourcing it to a BPO’er in India. Process was from initial cost saving idea towards full outsourcing of the transactional processes, PTP, OTC and RTR of the departments in Finland, Belgium and The Netherlands. Also selecting the right partner, being a transition manager and drawing the new organisation. Change management was an important factor. Result was a saving of a couple of millions a year on finance costs and more flexibility in down- or upgrading.
Integration (insourcing) and carve outs of companies within the financial department.
Restructuring Intercompany bookings so the differences are explanatory.
Balance sheet clean up by introducing automation and harmonization of the processes.
Introducing one chart of account accross countries and making an accounting manual where all the accounts are described.
Subscription liability investigation; research on a 2 million gap between sub- and GL ledger
Accounts payable automation by introducing electronic invoicing, and purchase management (PO).
Automation of the personnel expense claim process
Setting up an internal control framework for the FSS (using Bwise)
SOD project for all SAP roles
Set up a BTB dunning process
Outsourcing the BTB dunning process to (co-sourcing)
Migration projects from legacy systems to SAP ECC 
 Fast Close project (result in one day earlier reporting)

www.samilofinance.nl
profile_positions.title: Owner

company.name: Urban Gym Group (Trainmore, Club Sportive, High Studios)

profile_positions.company: Urban Gym Group (Trainmore, Club Sportive, High Studios)
profile_positions.description: Setting up a full Finance department in NL, setting up new financial processes, migration from Exact Online to Exact Globe, migration from Elvy to Scansys. Using the consolidation tool LucaNet to do the monthly reporting. Insourcing the accounting department from India to The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Senior Finance Controller a.i.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for data migration from the legacy system Metacom to Business Central (Navision) in a SAAS environment. Also the connection point between finance and the migration team and helping with the implementing Whitevision as a PtP workflow.
profile_positions.title: Finance Project Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Restructuring the Finance Department and introducing the right roles, role descriptions, responsibilities and making sure the service towards the business is the right one and people can find the department.
Results: 
1.	Cashflow forecasts that resulted from a negative cashflow into a positive one.
2.	Robotising the inboxes of account payable (RPA)
3.	Introducing the account payable role
4.	Improving processes so that it is SOX proof (account payable, media buying process flow)
5.	Balance specification and cleaning up the balance to prepare the financial statement 2019
6.	Putting the procedure in place for financial lease and fixed assets
7.     Making sure the Financial Statements could be audited
8.     Key-user for the ERP system
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager a.i. Omnicom Media Group

profile_positions.description:
Improve the inter- and intracompany process of Heineken Nederland and advice what should change.
Together with the shared service center in Poland (captive) working on the invoice overdues (OTC and PTP).

Result: introduction of trading partners in SAP, Intercompany dispute committee and more pressure that alle the operational companies need to follow the global IC policy.
profile_positions.title: Finance Project manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the financial accounting department of Miss Etam, Promiss, Steps, Claudia Straeter, Expresso. Taking care:
* Annual and monthly close process
* First point of contact with the auditors
* Consilidation into the consolidation tool (OneStream)
* Preparing the annual report of Miss Etam Holding
* Cash flow forecasting
* Intercompany settlements
* Improving processes like rent administration, stock, online sales, cash deck
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager a.i. FNG groep Nederland

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the financial accounting department of Miss Etam, Promiss and Steps (retail business).
The department has 7 FTE and are reporting directly to me. It consists of GL, AP, AR and risk/fraude.

Most important tasks:
- coaching people
- structuring the month end close process
- intercompany reconciliation
- cashflow forecasting (setting up a structure)
- focus on fraude and risk concerning the cash in the stores
- Processes with the PSP providers 
- Stock accounting
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Financial department of Sanoma Media Netherlands,  Finland and Belgium. Together with the BPO'er, as the transactional finance activities have been outsourced to India, I make sure that the financial reporting is accurate and on time.  Also continues improvement, according to the Lean metholody, is an important part of the retained organisation together with Genpact. Total group is 80 FTE large covering three different countries. The FSS has been outsourced for a couple of years now and I was part of the project team to get this Financial Shared Services established. Contracting the BP'er (Genpact), drawing the new organisation, hiring the people and the change management towards the business.

Responsibilities:
Direct report to VP Finance Group Control at corporate level (Finland)
Responsible for all financial accounting departments of Finland, The Netherlands and Belgium, 4 direct reports (RTR, PTP, OTC, Service Director) and total of 25 FTE.
Responsible to make sure that the BPO’er in India is performing according to the agreement. The team in India consisting of 60 FTE.
Responsible for the SLA and KPI’s which has been agreed upon with the BPO’er as well as the SLA with the internal customers.
Responsible for FSS budget and charges towards the internal customers.
Responsible for accurate accounting IFRS, Finnish GAAP, Belgium GAAP
The tasks are;
-Change management within the whole Sanoma Group because of the new way of working with a FSS where the activities have been outsourced.
-Harmonizing and standardizing the financial processes within the different countries.
-Responsible for the whole financial processes that result in a financial report towards Group Control (month end close).
-Making sure that the internal controls are put in place.
-First point of contact for CEO, CFO, VP, Controlling department.
-First point of contact for external auditors, tax authorities.
Participating in steering committees concerning projects.
profile_positions.title: Director Financial Shared Services

volunteer_experiences.description: Active participant for MR and projects concerning educational learning.
